definition: Gram stain (used to distinguished two different kinds of bacteria)

definition: animal hide/leather/to reform/to remove/to expel (from office)
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
see 月氏[Yue4 zhi1] and 閼氏|阏氏[yan1 zhi1]
to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
